name: Super Heavy Duty
overview: Voliera City AD 2025 - a modern metropolis downed in crime. Mayoral candidate and weapons firm heir, Ken Falconi, pledging to clean up the city, gains the attention of a hidden evil. With a member of the Falconi family now murdered, it's time to suit up, take revenge, and restore peace to the city once and for all! A brand-new adventure for the SEGA Genesis and Mega Drive, spanning 5 districts and over 30 stages. Have you got what it takes to hunt down all 150 enemies and unmask the conspiracy of the decade?
